actionTemplate.title: Upturned Brow
steps: Define and slightly lift the arch; extend the tail upward
Angle the lower line upward toward the arch for lift
Taper into a thin tail and avoid dropping the end
Deepen the arch and tail; keep the front airy
Use concealer to sharpen the lifted angle

rationaleTemplate: The most obvious lifting effect for a sharp, confident vibe.
Pairs well with cat-eye or upturned liner looks.
